caption:
Are you using our Fill + Treat Serum correctly? 👀💉

The fine tip applicator makes it easy to target wrinkle-prone areas such as the crow’s feet, eleven lines, and smile lines.

Step 1: On cleansed skin, apply a thin layer directly to lines and wrinkles.
Step 2: Follow up with your favorite moisturizer and sunscreen in the morning.

You can apply the Fill + Treat Serum both during the day and at night. If you are new to Retinol, start by using the product every other day or a few times a week to evaluate your skin’s response and then gradually increase usage.

Powered by Triple Hyaluronic Acid, RoC Retinol, and Swertiamarin, this lightweight serum sinks into the skin instantly to plump skin and fill in the look of wrinkles so they’re less noticeable in the mirror. 🪞✨
